title: ‘I think there’s no winning of AGI,’ says Microsoft AI Chief on Artificial General Intelligence hype
description: Suleyman’s remarks appear to be a direct counter-message to the theory often promoted by competitors like OpenAI’s Sam Altman and Meta’s Mark Zuckerberg, who have framed AGI as the ultimate technological trophy.

title: Gautam Adani inspires young India to lead the AI age

title: Adani's journey is inspiration to hardworking youth: Pawar
description: BARAMATI, Dec 28: NCP (SP) chief Sharad Pawar on Sunday said industrialist Gautam Adani’s journey serves as an inspiration to hardworking youth who dream big. He was speaking at the inauguration of the Sharadchandra Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati in Pune district. The centre of excellence, funded by the Adani Group chairman, has been established under Vidya Pratishthan, the educational institute governed by the Pawar family.
